text: Ra uhi yasto cha jasale ki ratima timro jyanala'i (kehi ansama) aphno niyantranama lincha ra jeâ€“jati timile dinama gardachau tyo jandacha, pheri timila'i dinama byujha'idincha, taki nirdharita samaya pura garihaliyos, ani timila'i usaitira pharkera janucha. Pheri usale timila'i bata'unecha juna timile garnegareka thiyau
